title: Women On Mars, Flaming Lips, And The Streets Of Skid Row
teaser: In this week's podcast of Weekends on All Things Considered, there's talk of sending a team of women to Mars, the band Flaming Lips takes on The Beatles, and we report from the streets of Skid Row.
